video.title: Beyblade: Metal Masters
video.synopsis: In this anime-based series, superblader Gingka has emerged victorious in the Battle Bladers Championship but now faces new rivals for his crown.

episodes.synopsis: Ryo, Gingka's father, acts as director of the new WBBA. But the first tournament is disrupted by a blader named Masamune.
episodes.title: Seeking the Legend

episodes.synopsis: Gingka defeats Masamune, but Masamune challenges Gingka again and again, determined to train hard enough to beat him.
episodes.title: The Persistent Challenger

episodes.synopsis: New blader Mei-Mei invites Gingka into battle in which she's partnered with Chiyun and Gingka is partnered with Masamune.
episodes.title: A New Challenge

episodes.synopsis: At a qualifying tournament to select representatives for the Beyblade World Championships, Gingka finds that he's already on the team.
episodes.title: Ticket to the World

episodes.synopsis: Kyoya and Rock Leone face Tsubasa and Earth Eagle at a qualifying match for the final spot on Team Japan for the Beyblade World Championships.
episodes.title: Final Battle! Leone vs. Eagle

episodes.synopsis: Since Kyoya has refused to join Team Japan for the Beyblade World Championships, a battle is arranged to decide who will be the final Regular Member.
episodes.title: Soar into the World!

episodes.synopsis: When Team Japan arrives in China, they're invited to their opponents' practice facility to observe their training rituals.
episodes.title: The Beylin Temple in the Sky

episodes.synopsis: Madoka and Gingka visit the opposing team's training camp to find out who the third blader is, but Masamune stumbles onto the blader himself.
episodes.title: The Third Man

episodes.synopsis: After his loss to Chaoxin, Masamune begins hard bey training in the wilderness, where he meets an old man who walks him through some unique training.
episodes.title: The World Championships Begin!

episodes.synopsis: In a heated battle, Chiyun taunts Tsubasa relentlessly about his rigid battling style, prompting Tsubasa to lose control and go on a wild rampage.
episodes.title: Lacerta's Will

episodes.synopsis: When Dashan faces Gingka in the third and deciding battle of the first round of the Beyblade World Championships, both competitors put up a fight.
episodes.title: The 4,000 Year Old Secret

episodes.synopsis: Gingka and the team travel abroad, where they watch Team Desert Blaze do battle with Team Excalibur from the EU.
episodes.title: The Bey with a Hero¿s Name

episodes.synopsis: Gingka and the rest of Team Gangan Galaxy travel by train to Russia to meet their next opponents in the Beyblade World Championships.
episodes.title: The Wintry Land of Russia

episodes.synopsis: Gingka and the rest of Team Gangan Galaxy travel by train to Russia to meet their next opponents in the Beyblade World Championships.
episodes.title: How Grand! The Cage Match!

episodes.synopsis: Yu must take Masamune's place in the next battle against Aleksey. But Anton and Aleksey have rigged the stadium to disable Flame Libra's Special Move.
episodes.title: Libra Departs for the Front!

episodes.synopsis: The bladers find themselves in Greece, where they must battle the European Union, aka Team Excalibur.
episodes.title: The Festival of Warriors

episodes.synopsis: Gingka, Masamune, Tusbasa and Yu try to work on their teamwork skills but end up quarrelling even more than usual.
episodes.title: We Meet Again! Wang Hu Zhong

episodes.synopsis: Kyoya travels to take part in a tournament that will allow him to attend the Beyblade World Championships if he finishes in the top three.
episodes.title: The Scorching Hot Lion

episodes.synopsis: Gingka and the rest of Team Gangan Galaxy travel to India to watch India's Team Chandora do battle with Africa's Team Wild Fang.
episodes.title: The Shocking Wild Fang

episodes.synopsis: The Beyblade World Championships have returned to Japan, where everyone is excited to watch Gingka battle Kyoya.
episodes.title: Horuseus vs. Striker

episodes.synopsis: The long-awaited rematch between Gingka and Kyoya has finally arrived, and their battle is of epic proportions.
episodes.title: Eternal Rivals

episodes.synopsis: The third and tie-breaking match between Gangan Galaxy and Wild Fang takes the form of a team battle, with Yu and Tsubasa facing Benkei and Damoure.
episodes.title: The Third Match, on the Edge

episodes.synopsis: With Team Gangan Galaxy tied with Team Wild Fang, a fourth and final team battle is set to determine a winner.
episodes.title: The End of a Fierce Struggle!

episodes.synopsis: Team Gangan Galaxy are in shock when they learn that their teammate Tsubasa has been infected by a dark power.
episodes.title: The Creeping Darkness

episodes.synopsis: Chiyun battles Klaus in an elimination bout and loses in spite of his best efforts, eliminating Wang Hu Zhong from the tournament.
episodes.title: The Axe of Destruction

episodes.synopsis: Julian Konzern and Team Excalibur return to Italy, where Konzern is surprised to be challenged to a battle by Tsubasa.
episodes.title: The Dragon Emperor Returns

episodes.synopsis: Team Gangan Galaxy travels to Italy for the tournament finals, where Masamune must challenge Klaus of Team Excalibur.
episodes.title: Exceed the Limit!

episodes.synopsis: Tsubasa and Yu battle Wales and Sophie in the finals, with Tsubasa defeating both his own dark side and the opponents to claim victory.
episodes.title: Dark Eagle

episodes.synopsis: Julian Konzern and Gingka meet in the final and deciding battle for the A Block of the Beyblade World Championships.
episodes.title: Gravity Destroyer

episodes.synopsis: Trouble ensues when Team Gangan Galaxy arrives in Brazil for the finals of the Beyblade World Championships.
episodes.title: The Midday Street Battle

episodes.synopsis: Yu recovers from his injuries in time to battle Enso Garcia in the first match of the finals, but he and his damaged Libra lose.
episodes.title: The Brazilian Trap

episodes.synopsis: Gingka battles Selen, but she surprises him by conceding the battle after managing to drain much of Pegasus's power in the process.
episodes.title: The Explosive Cyclone Battle!

episodes.synopsis: Tsubasa and Argo battle to see which of their teams will advance to the finals of the Beyblade World Championships.
episodes.title: Charge! Ray Gill

episodes.synopsis: Team Gangan Galaxy arrives in the United States to watch the next matches in the Beyblade World Championships.
episodes.title: The Friend's Name Is Zeo

episodes.synopsis: When Masamune finds his old friend Toby, we learn through flashback that they made a pact long ago to become the number-one bladers in the world.
episodes.title: Our Slogan Is 'Number 1'

episodes.synopsis: As Gingka and the rest of Gangan Galaxy visit the Dungeon Gym, Zeo battles Ryuga at HD Academy.
episodes.title: The Plot Thickens

episodes.synopsis: Zeo undergoes the "Arrangement" process at Dr. Ziggurat's lab, and then challenges Masamune to a battle.
episodes.title: The Compass of Fate: Byxis

episodes.synopsis: With Tsubasa and Yu in the hospital, the rest of Gangan Galaxy attends a match between Team Excalibur and Team Star Breaker.
episodes.title: The Wicked Peacock: Befall

episodes.synopsis: When Julian Konzern of Team Excalibur battles Damian Heart of Team Star Breaker, Damian challenges Julian to a best-two-out-of-three match.
episodes.title: The Guard Dog of Hades: Kerbecs

episodes.synopsis: Gangan Galaxy tries to pick a replacement member for the Final Battle, but Kenta, Team Wang Hu Zhong and Ryo are all disqualified.
episodes.title: The Furious DJ Battle!?

episodes.synopsis: The final matches of the Beyblade World Championships begin, and Zeo of Team Star Breaker battles Masamune of Team Gangan Galaxy.
episodes.title: The Final Countdown

episodes.synopsis: Gingka is ready to face Jack in the second battle of the final round of the Beyblade World Championships, but Ryuga shows up to take his place.
episodes.title: The Dragon Emperor Descends

episodes.synopsis: Ryo tells Team Gangan Galaxy that the U.S. team, Star Breaker, consists of members that have been artificially enhanced by Dr. Ziggurat.
episodes.title: Spirit's Last Battle

episodes.synopsis: Gingka's bout with Damian in the final battle of the Beyblade World Championships continues. Who will emerge victorious?
episodes.title: Showdown! Gingka vs. Damian

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Ziggurat and a group of disgraced bladers crash the victory party for Team Gangan Galaxy and corner Gingka and his friends.
episodes.title: The Miraculous Spiral Force

episodes.synopsis: When Gingka and his friends decide to go after Dr. Ziggurat, they encounter Ziggurat's minions, who use their beys to try and stop their progress.
episodes.title: Charge! Hades City

episodes.synopsis: Gingka and his friends try to rescue Toby from the clutches of Dr. Ziggurat but are blocked by Julian Konzern.
episodes.title: The Fallen Emperor

episodes.synopsis: While Gingka, Masamune and Kyoya try to find Toby in Hades City, Jack challenges Tsubasa to a battle.
episodes.title: Befall's Trap

episodes.synopsis: While Masamune and Gingka try to reach the Spiral Core and Toby, Kyoya battles Damian.
episodes.title: The Wild Beast Unleashed

episodes.synopsis: Gingka and Masamune battle Faust at the Spiral Core, where Faust's bey sends them to another time and space with a Special Move.
episodes.title: Rampage! Tempo

episodes.synopsis: While Gingka tries to use Pegasus to absorb the excess energy at the Hades City reactor, Masamune finds he must battle Faust again.
episodes.title: Galaxy Heart
